subject: Baseball
All Star Games
lead_paragraph: Commissioner Bud Selig and Yankees shortstop Derek Jeter entered the league in the same year, and as they prepare to ride off into the sunset of retirement, their respect for what each brought to the game is evident.
snippet: Commissioner Bud Selig and Yankees shortstop Derek Jeter entered the league in the same year, and as they prepare to ride off into the sunset of retirement, their respect for what each brought to the game is evident.
